sentences.english: Danba Hydropower Station is located in Ganzi Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture in Sichuan Province Danba County.

sentences.english: This paper gives a comprehensive presentation of Yele Hydropower Station rock-fill dam design.

sentences.english: This paper introduces the reformation of the station-service power supply equipment at Chencun Hydropower Station.

sentences.english: Yunfeng hydropower station is an international power station cooperated by China andDPRK.
